Name: The [Pick of] Destiny
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by Amanda Washington at Rye, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The [Pick of] Destiny contains 218 calories
